title: Protestatio attestata coram Anthonio Luthero Armigero uno iusticiariorum pacis pro comitatu Essexi√¶. ... = A protestation attested before Anthony Luther Esquire, one of the justices of the peace, for the county of Essex, vpon June 10. 1644. As the causes why the protesters could not heare in the publike assemblies of the Church of England, and so joyn in worship with that ministry.
author: Fage, Robert.
notes: In Latin with English translation facing.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
